scripts.build: docker build -f Dockerfile-node8 -t gcr.io/dockyard-demo/node8 . && docker build -f Dockerfile-node8-slim -t gcr.io/dockyard-demo/node8-slim . && docker build -f Dockerfile-node8-alpine -t gcr.io/dockyard-demo/node8-alpine . && docker build -f Dockerfile-node8-stretch -t gcr.io/dockyard-demo/node8-stretch .
scripts.push: docker push gcr.io/dockyard-demo/node8 && docker push gcr.io/dockyard-demo/node8-slim && docker push gcr.io/dockyard-demo/node8-alpine && docker push gcr.io/dockyard-demo/node8-stretch
